arabic_text: أَتَىٰٓ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ فَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُوهُۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
translation: (1) The command of Allāh is coming,[690] so be not impatient for it. Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him.
footnotes: [690]- Literally, "has come," indicating the certainty and nearness of the Last Hour.
